Reviews.Title: “Last minute resort turned Great!”
Reviews.Author: Majlis R
Reviews.Content: booked hotel terrible experience arrived late nh 7 month brought playpen minutes friendly staff comfortable wifi wasnt free reasonably priced excellent breakfast start day hotel nearby attractions located sbahn stations walk

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel for the weekend break”
Reviews.Author: stephenr67
Reviews.Content: stayed friday 17th sunday 19th february walked sbahn station zoo 10 mins window shopping main shopping street kudamm steps hotel beside underground station theres plenty shopping dining tour buses stop getting sites spotless modern amount space bathroom bit modern clean nice touch underfloor heating tiled floor deal included mini bar couple beers wine fruit juice soft drinks water chocolate snacks 40 euros worth late checkout included hot foods eggs sausages bacon etc cold meats cheeses cereals yogurts breads juices teas coffee fresh waffles perfect chocolate spread checked fitness site didnt areawith 3 4 machines sauna steamroom hot beds friends loved word warning berlin weekend dont leave shopping sunday 99 stores closed gift stores museums sunday

Reviews.Title: “Comfort and style in a great location”
Reviews.Author: GolfGirlDundee
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel december 2011january 2012 celebrate hotel stylish modern comfortable clean location excellent restaurants bars doorstep appreciated spa gym 7th floor relax walking berlin day public transport round corner – ubahn uhlandstrasse sbahn savigny platz shopping minutes shopping street kurfuerstendamm downside charge wifi using internet travels

Reviews.Title: “Good location, pleasant hotel”
Reviews.Author: looptail
Reviews.Content: hotel easy bus sbahn reception staff friendly helpful spoke excellent english fourth floor overlooking street isnt busy anyway little noise clean comfy otherwise welcoming restaurant little annoying internet terminals particularly cheap wed stay location comfort helpful staff

Reviews.Title: “Loved the location; Great rooms and breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Yana_Sh
Reviews.Content: clean super comfortable bed breakfast weekend deal breakfast included late checkout sunday free minibar recommended location close lovely square savignyplatz lovely public transportation u1 construction changes convenient

Reviews.Title: “Great location for a very comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Portcred
Reviews.Content: quiet ish location situated hotel fresh clean spacious hospitable staff respond charm request manage intimate berlin hotel ive visited third nh hotel booked standard service quality consistent throughout property unique bland chain hotel experience return berlin june stay little time possibly sample excellent restaurants

Reviews.Title: “A hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: Gary488
Reviews.Content: hotel ideally placed shopping sight seeing close metro charge breakfast internet expensive deal breakfast strongly recommend 18 euros didnt bother locally plenty time hotels busy berlin holiday sensible price cheap location helps

Reviews.Title: “highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: griswolds09
Reviews.Content: 4star hotel steps berlins main avenue expect fine hotel outside step looks bright basic huge comfy kingsize bed extra rollaway teenager minibar safe coffeemaker available flat screen tv 35 channels stayed main building train noise bearable fine fitness sauna 7th floor connecting outdoor roof terrace kurfuerstendamm steakhouse netto supermarket minutes walk hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Choice”
Reviews.Author: haaspw
Reviews.Content: hotel recommneded travel agent excellent choice personnel reception bar breakfast housekeeping friendly helpful hotel pleasant modern decor nice bar near reception quiet comfortable bed appointed bathroom breakfast buffet generous varied friendly personnel coffee location close ubahn bus recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good for a city trip to Berlin”

Reviews.Content: hotel located kurfuerstendamm public transport connection airport shuttle stopping front liked breakfast bed paid little bit extra special late checkout possibility convenient

Reviews.Author: jensatravellin
Reviews.Content: location perfect walking distance city bus stop easy city buses airport hotel affordable clean centrally located hopon hopoff bus corner kurfurstendamm hard rock cafe walking distance church forget name damaged war plenty restaurants kurfurstendamm shopping beside church underground shopping center irish pub forget name didnt serve food evening live band playing alright spot sunday night
